actions.detail: Move any number of drones within Sensors – including those belonging to other characters – up to 4 spaces in any direction.
actions.name: Guide the Flock

actions.detail: Characters of your choice within Sensors adjacent to any Drone or Deployable, even those they own, take 2 energy damage.
actions.name: Electropulse

system.description: Developed by HORUS collectivists, H0r_OS-Rv60 EXP PUPPETMASTER is an interesting piece of anti-drone software. It doesn’t invade a target’s main systems, instead attacking their auxiliary drone-command systems. This sideways attack evades most electronic countermeasures by targeting the subcognitive networks of enemy drones. Once inside a network, PUPPETMASTER spreads ontological-kill memes like wildfire through enemy swarms, eventually following the network traces back to their origin and corrupting the parent nexus.
